mapper.sql: ci.id, ci.trip_id, ci.added_by, ci.item_overview_id, ci.name, ci.category_id, ci.priority, ci.description, ci.created_at, ci.updated_at
mapper.select: SELECT , u.name AS added_by_name FROM cooperative_items ci LEFT JOIN users u ON ci.added_by = u.id WHERE ci.trip_id = #{tripId} ORDER BY ci.created_at ASC
SELECT , u.name AS added_by_name FROM cooperative_items ci LEFT JOIN users u ON ci.added_by = u.id WHERE ci.trip_id = #{tripId} AND ci.name = #{name} LIMIT 1
SELECT , u.name AS added_by_name FROM cooperative_items ci LEFT JOIN users u ON ci.added_by = u.id WHERE ci.trip_id = #{tripId} AND ci.item_overview_id = #{itemOverviewId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cooperative_items (trip_id, added_by, item_overview_id, name, category_id, priority, description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{tripId}, #{addedBy}, #{itemOverviewId}, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{priority}, #{description}, NOW(), NOW())
